授業方法:
HyFlex：Hybrid-Flexible
Face to Face and Online by Zoom
Based on the teacher's presentation at the former part of the class, we discuss on the subject.

第1回:
<Fundamental of Information Systems>  
1. Enterprise Information Systems and the Systems Development Process
Understand the overview of the enterprise information system.

1.Outline of Enterprise Information Systems
Development process of Information Systems
Stakeholders of Information System Development
Download the texts before the class and prepare for questions.
第2回:
2.IT Division and IT Provider
Understand roles and functions of IT division who construct and service Enterprise IS.
Understand the real state of Information Technology Service providers
Download the texts before the class and prepare for questions.
第3回:
<Case Study>
3. IS in Medium and Small company
It is easy to understand the full picture of IS in Medium and small companies.
Case 1 ： Tokai Bane(spring)
Case 2 : Mary Chocolate company
Download the texts before the class and prepare for questions.
第4回:
4. IS in large company
Compare with cases in small medium companies
Case 3 : Dell
Case 4 : Seven Eleven
Download the texts before the class and prepare for questions.
第5回:
<Tasks of IT managemnet>
5. IT strategy, Requirement definition, System Development and Operation
System Audit Standards and COBIT, by comparing these two standards, understand tasks of IT strategy. And then understand main tasks of IS department, that is, system development and operation.
6. Procurement of IS service
　For system development and operation, outsourcing is the most common method. Understand these procurement processes.
Download the texts before the class and prepare for questions.
第6回:
<IT Management>
7. Modern problems in IT Management
　Based on the report of “Best Practice conference on CIO's functions and practices”, we deepen our knowledge on IT management.
　- CIO's 7 functions
8. Strategy Management
　　IT investments should be done as methods to achieve the company’s strategy. To understand this insistence, we learn about strategy management, that is, Balanced Scorecard (BSC).
　-The history of BSC
　-The newest theory of BSC
Download the texts before the class and prepare for questions.
第7回:
9. BSC, IT Investment Management and Enterprise Architecture
With BSC we can align IT investment to the enterprise strategy.
And Enterprise Architecture is also an important framework.
-BSC and IT investment management
-What is Enterprise Architecture (EA)
-BSC and EA and IT investment management
Download the texts before the class and prepare for questions.
第8回:
10. Modern IT management
Like Web2.0 a paradigm shift is occurring in enterprise systems. By understanding this new movement and think about new IT systems from now on.
- Cloud computing
- BPM and SOA
Download the texts before the class and prepare for questions.
第9回:
＜Conclusion before DT＞
11. Mass Customization and Modern IT
Cloud computing shows the new style for the system development and the system procurement. By comparing with mass customization we understand this new style.
-What is mass customization
　　-SaaS, SOA and mass customization
　　-New system development style BPM+SOA
Download the texts before the class and prepare for questions.
第10回:
12. Discussion on the direction of IT management
　-Architecture Maturity Stages
Download the texts before the class and prepare for questions.
第11回:
<Digital Transformation>
13. Digital Retail
'Omni-Channel' has become one of the most important strategies, but retailers have moved to the next stage, called Digital Retail.
  - What is Digital Transformation
  - Fundamentals of Omni-Channel
  - Omni-Channel to Digital Retail
Download the texts before the class and prepare for questions.
第12回:
14. IoT and Digital Transformation
IoT have great influences on the manufacturing industries.
- Two big streams of IoT and their impacts
- How to promote Digital Transformation
Download the texts before the class and prepare for questions.
第13回:
15. Management framework for DT
  5 Building Blocks is the DT framework for CIO/CDO. ‘The New Elements of Digital Transformation’ is the DT framework for CEO. And Design Thinking /Service Design must become the core culture. 
  - New framework for DT
  - What is Design Thinking /Service Design
Download the texts before the class and prepare for questions.
第14回:
16. AI and Digital Supply Chain 
AI is the key technology for DT and Digital Supply Chain Management is the newest challenge for DT
  - How to manage AI
  - Digital supply chain management
Download the texts before the class and prepare for questions.
トピック.授業外学習2: Download the texts from LUNA and read them before class and prepare questions.

評価.参考文献・資料Reference books0:
Kaplan, Robert S. and David P. Norton, Strategy Maps: Converting Intangible Assets into
Tangible Outcomes, Harvard Business School Press 2004
https://hbr.org/2014/11/how-smart-connected-products-are-transforming-competition

Jeanne W. Ross, Cynthia M. Beath, Martin Mocker, “Designed for Digital: How to Architect Your Business for Sustained Success”, The MIT Press September 2019.
評価.学位授与の方針との関連Relationship to Diploma Polic:
各授業科目は、各学部・研究科の定めるディプロマ・ポリシー（DP）・カリキュラム・ポリシー（CP）に基づき、カリキュラム上に配置されています。
DP・CPを意識して本授業科目の学修を進めることで、各学部・研究科の期待する能力が養成されます。
各学部・研究科のDP、CPや教育課程表（授業科目一覧等）は、下記リンクこちらに掲載していますので学修計画の参考にしてください。
